virality_potential.justification: Provocative comparison between Bitcoin, gold, and Ethereum that can spark debate within crypto communities; user has large following, but content is niche, so medium-high virality potential.

informative_value.justification: Opinion-based claim without supporting data; minimal factual content.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral tone, no strong emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant for a few days to weeks; once the discussion resolves, it may fade.

virality_potential.justification: Speculative prediction that can attract attention within crypto community; user has large following; but not breaking news.

duration_of_impact.justification: Potentially relevant for weeks as people discuss the prediction; eventually fades.

virality_potential.justification: Philosophical statement that can resonate with community but not necessarily go viral.

informative_value.justification: Opinion-based statement; no new factual info.

duration_of_impact.justification: Evergreen philosophical statement; can be referenced over time.

virality_potential.justification: Detailed breakdown of liquidations; can be widely shared among traders and crypto community; user Blockworks has large following.

informative_value.justification: Provides credible, newsworthy data about liquidations; includes numbers and totals.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant for days to a week; eventually fades.

virality_potential.justification: Humorous take on gas fees; can resonate with community; user has moderate following.

informative_value.justification: Opinion-based statement; no new factual info.

duration_of_impact.justification: Relevant for a few weeks; eventually fades.
